document.full_text: washington goalie michal neuvirth made 22 saves for his first playoff shutout to help the capitals beat the new york rangers 2-0 on friday to strengthen their nhl series lead.
document.title: caps blitz rangers to take 2-0 series lead
lines_and_colors: washington goalie michal neuvirth made 22 saves for his first playoff shutout to help the capitals beat the new york rangers 2-0 on friday to strengthen their nhl series lead.
